order_instructions.execution_note: Execute as a single COMBO order if your broker supports it, or execute legs sequentially starting with long options (legs 2 & 4) first to establish risk definition. position_sizing.sizing_reasoning: With ₹2,00,000 capital and 4-5% max risk tolerance (₹8,000-10,000), you could theoretically take 6-8 lots. HOWEVER, this is your FIRST trade with this system. Start with 1 lot to TEST execution, understand P&L dynamics, and manage emotions. Iron condors have gamma risk near ATM - if market moves sharply, losses accelerate. Conservative sizing allows you to learn without significant capital impairment. After 5-10 successful trades, scale to 2-3 lots maximum.

caveats_and_disclaimers: This recommendation becomes INVALID if: (1) NIFTY gaps up > 200 points and sustains above 26,100 in first hour, (2) VIX spikes above 15, (3) Major global news event (geopolitical, Fed emergency meeting, etc.), (4) RBI announces surprise policy change.
3 DTE creates elevated gamma risk - market can move faster than historical volatility suggests. Position sizing at 1 lot acknowledges this risk.
Iron condors have 'negative gamma' - the closer you get to expiry and the closer NIFTY gets to your short strikes, the faster losses accelerate. This is WHY we exit by 2:00 PM on expiry day.

Backtested performance is NOT indicative of future results. This specific trade setup has ~62% probability of profit but that means 38% probability of loss. Expect losses - manage them with discipline.

Tax implications: Premium received is credited to your account but P&L settles at exit/expiry. Short-term capital gains taxed at slab rate for F&O. STT on sell side = 0.0625% of premium. Consult tax advisor.
